scripts.cy:local:parallel: npm run cy:local:folder1 & npm run cy:local:folder2
scripts.cy:cloud:parallel: npm run cy:folder1:cloud -- --group test1 --ci-build-id 6 --parallel '&' npm run cy:folder2:cloud -- --group test2 --ci-build-id 6 --parallel
scripts.cy:parallel:config13d:folder2:electron:c: npm run cy:folder1:chrome:config13d:cloud -- --group chrome --ci-build-id 27 --parallel '&' npm run cy:folder2:electron:comfig24d:cloud -- --group electron --ci-build-id 27 --parallel
